site_title: Foldable Knife by Robert J. Lang

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This Origami Foldable Knife by Robert J. Lang is truly one of a kind. It really looks like a jack knife and has a retractable blade. Give it a try and see if you like it. Learn it in less than a minute! Enjoy!!! Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
